news.headline: AWS and InfluxData Expand Strategic Offering with InfluxDB 3 on Amazon Timestream for InfluxDB
news.summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 16, 2025--InfluxData, creator of the leading time series database, InfluxDB, today announced the availability of InfluxDB 3 Core and InfluxDB 3 Enterprise to Amazon Timestream for InfluxDB.
